comments.html: I can confirm that Gemini 2.5 Flash created an almost-perfect topology given the same prompt. Thank you!
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
I can recommend to try it with gemini 2.5 pro I made it for a big ospf tdma network with over 200 routers and it worked pretty will had to do one / 2 modifications and paste 2 netlab doc pages and it worked really well!

Although I had a previous containerlab.yml as context too which might have helped for that...
comments.name: Muddyblack
